SqlQuery.Data: SELECT acknowledgment.notes, acknowledgment_class.desc as description, acknowledgment.successful, signature.sig_name, signature.sig_sid, signature.sig_gid FROM event LEFT JOIN signature ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) RIGHT JOIN acknowledgment on (acknowledgment.sid = event.sid AND acknowledgment.cid = event.cid ) LEFT JOIN acknowledgment_class on (acknowledgment_class.id = acknowledgment.class ) #WHERE# GROUP BY acknowledgment.notes, signature.sig_name
